author: Special Correspondent
text:
A total of 48,274 candidates will appear for the Tamil Nadu Public Service Commission Group II examinations across the district on Sunday.

A total of 110 centres have been setup in the district for the examinations.

The District Collector V. Sampath held discussion with the officials of various departments on successful holding of the examinations. He called upon close coordination between the revenue, Tangedco, Police, Fire and Rescue Services, Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation on the examination day.

The entire examination process will be video graphed and CCTV cameras will be installed in four particular centres.

A.Gnanagowri, Chief Educational Officer, C. Vijaybabu, Revenue Divisional Officer and others were present at the meeting.
title: Over 48,000 to appear for TNPSC exam
